example.parse: (TOP (PP-PRP (PREP لِ) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ إِنّ) (S (S (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_P دُول) (CONJ أَوْ) (DEM_PRON_MS دَه)) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN شَخْص)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PRT (PROG_PART بِ)) (IV3MS+IV يِسْتَهْبِل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1))))))) (CONJ وِ) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR-NOM-PRD (WHNP-3 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (ADJ.VN قاصِد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (SBAR (-NONE- 0) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV يِشَوِّه) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN التَيّار) (DET+ADJ الإِسْلامِي)))))))))))))
